description: This file sets up and runs an AI agent with a PDF knowledge base, using async functions to load data and generate responses.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An AI agent that interacts with a knowledge base and generates responses.

classes.name: PDFUrlKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A knowledge base that loads PDF content from URLs.

classes.name: Llama
classes.description: A model class representing the Llama language model.

classes.name: PgVector
classes.description: A vector database interface using PostgreSQL and pgvector.

methods.name: aload
methods.description: Asynchronously loads the knowledge base, recreating data if specified.

methods.name: aprint_response
methods.description: Asynchronously generates and prints a response from the agent based on a query.
